articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for May 19 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Germany’s benchmark DAX Index climbed closer to an all-time high as a broad rally swept up European stocks.
articles.content:
Germany’s benchmark DAX Index climbed closer to an all-time high as a broad rally swept up European stocks.
